replies.body:
Artic Ops Rengar?

They could get away with it.

Still, +9

Omega Squad Rengar?

Special Ops Rengar (like GP's) is probably the closest
Diamond Cats Rengar?

> [{quoted}](name=Samflash3,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BKtIjnGU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-12T02:26:24.727+0000)
>
> #**Arctic Ops Rengar**
I see that +9 and I raise you +11

I gave the ninth up vote!

I GAVE THE NINTH UP VOTE!!

**I GAVE THE NINTH–**

I mean, I agree with your statement, thank you.

Playing through this game right now. Pretty damn sexy.

And that skin art is even sexier. 10/10 would buy. Too bad copyright though.

And even though it'd defeat the point I think it'd be hilarious to see his Ult just being a (visible) cardboard box running around.

Shen would like a word with you. 

"whats a copyright?"

I don't know what you're talking about that is *clearly* nothing more than a color swap....

< _ <
Mortal Kombat.
http://i.imgur.com/8vwmr9n.png
I am really retarded, aren't I.

I think it'd be enough to change his model to be the box but still be invisible.

But yeah, this would also be amazing.
That would be so pointless and amazing. I wouldnt kill him for the sake of the skin if that were to happen.
{{champion:104}} would like to have a word with you about that cigar.
Solid Rengar
Battlecast Cho = Rex?

Rengar can have a cigar, but we can't have a beefy masculine female champion?


(Did I do it right?)

Dammit now I have to change it.

Did I mention that this is amazing?

I want a Metal Gear Kha'Zix and when Big Boss Rengar taunts him he goes "METAL GEEEEEAR"
Does Rengar yell "FIIIIIREE" when he uses his E? Because we're talking about insta-buy material right here.

Now we just need a Quiet skin ({{champion:51}} being the most obvious choice, but {{champion:28}} or {{champion:76}} are good alternatives).

And of course there's Fiddle/Fiddler {{champion:121}}.  We already have the Man on Fire ({{champion:63}}).

That ulti doh.. AKA Taka's W in Vain Glory the ipad game which is essentially league for ipad. Be original or at least give Vain Glory credit for stealing their idea!

I would buy Rengar just for this skin... well... mostly just for the ult... XD
mgs...nuff said...
